name: Dev-ribbon
tagline: Add a ribbon to your development sites
body:
# dev-ribbon
Add a ribbon to your development sites, just like the Github Fork ribbon.

Add this tag to your HTML, and if the `window.location.hostname` matches `localhost`, `.dev` or `.local` it will show a green "Development" banner in the top right.

```
<script type="text/javascript" src="dev-ribbon.min.js"></script>
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
